title: Parliamentarians announce to donate one-month salary for flood affectees: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 26 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Friday said the members of Parliament, responding to Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s call for assistance to flood affected people had announced to give one-month salary in the flood relief fund .
She, in a tweet, said the parliamentarians had expressed their solidarity with the flood victims by donating one-month salary and would continue to help the government in carrying out relief and rehabilitation activities.
وزیراعظم شہباز شریف کی سیلاب متاثرین کی امداد کی اپیل ارکان پارلیمنٹ نے ایک ماہ کی تنخواہ سیلاب فنڈ میں دینے کا اعلان کردیا ارکان پارلیمنٹ کا سیلاب متاثرین سے یک جہتی کا اظہار حکومت کے ساتھ مل کر سیلاب متاثرین کی ہر ممکن مدد کریں گے
— Marriyum Aurangzeb (@Marriyum_A) August 26, 2022
